sentences.sContent: The White House probably won't make this plan public until July.
sentences.sCn: 白宫可能要到7月份才会公布这项计划。

sentences.sContent: Van Gogh is probably the best-known painter in the world.
sentences.sCn: 梵高可能是世界上最知名的画家。

words.tran: 可能性；机率；[数] 或然率
很可能的事；大有希望的候选者

trans.tranOther: If you say that something is probably the case, you think that it is likely to be the case, although you are not sure
